segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she doesn't even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are about to cause a disaster, and she's completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so far into that cabinet, he's going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it's normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice when the water starts dripping on her apron.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter by the second, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene from a comedy, but it's actually kind of sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress is going to get soaked if she doesn't move soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
